objects.text:
• Active Noise Cancellation
• Transparency Mode
• Personalized Spatial Audio
• 20-Hour Battery Life

product_details.description: BREATHTAKING AUDIO QUALITY — Apple-designed dynamic driver provides high-fidelity audio. Computational audio combines custom acoustic design with the Apple H1 chip and software for breakthrough listening experiences. FOCUS ON WHAT’S PLAYING — Active Noise Cancellation blocks outside noise so you can immerse yourself in music. HEAR THE WORLD AROUND YOU — Transparency mode lets you hear and interact with the world around you. PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Max deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you. You can also listen to select songs, shows, and movies in Dolby Atmos. ACOUSTIC-FIRST DESIGN — Designed with a knit-mesh canopy and memory foam ear cushions for an exceptional over-ear fit that perfectly seals in sound. Brand - Apple ** Color - Green ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
The banner presents a modern product promotion layout for a tech gadget. It features a centered, high-resolution product image ("product_image") on a soft dual-tone green background with decorative wave patterns and translucent circles, giving a fresh and dynamic visual appeal. The main heading ("heading") uses large, bold typography to draw focus, supported by a stylized subheading ("subheading") with a playful font adding energy. Below that is a bullet point list ("description") outlining key features in a clean, readable format. The pricing ("price") stands out in bold, while the call-to-action ("cta") sits on a dark green rounded rectangle ("cta_background"), inviting user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Mint (#F0F5F0)
- Pale Green (#E3EFE3)
- Forest Green (#2A5738)
- Sage Green (#4D8B61)
- Light Grass Green (#ACDAAC)
- Medium Moss Green (#88C288)
- Dark Gray (#333333)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a pair of sleek over-ear headphones in a soft, elegant green tone. The primary color is a pastel mint green (#A8BCA1), which dominates the earcups and mesh fabric, creating a calm, modern look. This is blended seamlessly with a subtle metallic silver-green (#B6C5AE) on the frame, adding sophistication and refinement. The headband is accented with a light grayish-white (#E6EBE6), giving a clean and minimal contrast. Small metal joints in silver (#C0C0C0) add high-end detail and break monotony. Together, this palette radiates freshness and luxury, perfect for tech-focused promo visuals with a minimalist, nature-inspired theme.
